content: Hello everyone. If you are attending the Risk Assessment Review, we can document any decisions, notable discussion, questions here.

11:52 AM

Here are the links to the two profiles we could review related to risk assessments: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/dental-data-exchange/StructureDefinition-general-riskassessment.html and https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/dental-data-exchange/StructureDefinition-oral-finding.html
Hi All, let's use the "Caries Risk Assessment" thread Dave created starting this afternoon. Thanks!
